mapper.sql: lc_do_sql . id , lc_do_sql.title, lc_do_sql.description, lc_do_sql.query_file_name AS queryFileName, lc_do_sql.execution_file_name AS executionFileName, lc_do_sql.param_status AS paramStatus, lc_do_sql.sql_version AS sqlVersion, lc_do_sql.note, lc_do_sql.create_time AS createTime, lc_do_sql.update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT lc_do_sql.* FROM lc_do_sql WHERE lc_do_sql.id = #{id} GROUP BY lc_do_sql.id

SELECT
FROM lc_do_sql
WHERE 1=1
AND lc_do_sql.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND lc_do_sql.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.title},'%')
AND lc_do_sql.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.description},'%')
AND lc_do_sql.query_file_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.queryFileName},'%')
AND lc_do_sql.execution_file_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.executionFileName},'%')
AND lc_do_sql.status = #{record.status}
AND lc_do_sql.sort_number = #{record.sortNumber}
AND lc_do_sql.param_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.paramStatus},'%')
AND lc_do_sql.param_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.paramStatus},'%')
AND lc_do_sql.sql_version LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.sqlVersion},'%')
AND lc_do_sql.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND lc_do_sql.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND lc_do_sql.update_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.updateTime},'%')
AND lc_do_sql.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND lc_do_sql.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
ORDER BY lc_do_sql.sort_number DESC,lc_do_sql.update_time DESC , lc_do_sql.create_time DESC
